original_title: Megadeth: Live at Wacken Open Air 2017
overview: Megadeth at Hauptstrasse, Wacken, Germany on Wacken Open Air on August 4th, 2017. Setlist: Hangar 18 / Wake Up Dead / In My Darkest Hour / The Threat Is Real / Sweating Bullets / Conquer or Die! / Lying in State / Poisonous Shadows / Trust / Fatal Illusion / Tornado of Souls / Dystopia / Symphony of Destruction / Mechanix / Peace Sells / Holy Wars... The Punishment Due
title: Megadeth: Live at Wacken Open Air 2017
